greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k), partial row sums of the n-th row of A127013 read right to left.
comment: Also partial row sums of the n-th row of A126988 read left to right. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 21 2014
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..125 of triangle, flattened
formula: T = A126988 * M as infinite lower triangular matrices, M = (1; 1, 1; 1, 1, 1; ...).
program: for(n=1, 12, for(k=1,n, print1(T(n,k), ", "))) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Jun 03 2019
A126988:= func< n,k | (n mod k) eq 0 select n/k else 0 >;
def T(n,k): return sum(A126988(n,j) for j in (k..n))
[[T(n, k) for k in (1..n)] for n in (1..12)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Jun 03 2019
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Jan 04 2007
ext: Edited and extended by _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 23 2008
